title: [BUG] ArgumentNullException for Arg_ParamName_Name when decoding byte array
body:
**Description**

When trying to Decode an image from a byte array, I get the following error. The byte array has been created by SkiaSharp.

**Code**

```cs
using SkiaSharp.SKBitmap userImage = SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(@"C:\test.jpg");
using SkiaSharp.SKBitmap secondImage = SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(userImage.Bytes);
```

**Exception**
```
System.ArgumentNullException
  HResult=0x80004003
  Nachricht = Value cannot be null. Arg_ParamName_Name
  Quelle = SkiaSharp
  Stapelüberwachung:
   bei SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(SKCodec codec)
   bei SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(ReadOnlySpan`1 buffer)
   bei SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(Byte[] buffer)
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio
